channel.title: Bokeh Visualization library on Digital Forays
channel.description: Recent content in Bokeh Visualization library on Digital Forays

item.title: Sentiment Analysis of Peer Institutions' Main Twitter Accounts
item.description: Well, February has come around and that’s the time at my school where we get all kinds of nice financial data about how wages and compensation by faculty rank compare between a number of “peer institutions” (the usual ones linked with USF here in Chicagoland are Benedictine, Dominican, Lewis, and Saint Xavier) I wondered a bit if one might do a little bit of data visualization not of financial information, but of, say, Twitter accounts.
